Egyptian Queen Nefertiti Value Pack
Desc
Behind every king is a queen--where the real power is. Includes Crown, Top With Armlets, Left and Right Earrings, Legs and Sandals for a total of 6 pieces! [#Legal]
Derrière chaque roi se cache une reine, où le vrai pouvoir réside! Ce pack comprend 6 accessoires: une couronne, un haut avec brassards, des boucles d'oreilles, un bas et des sandales! [#Legal]
Hinter jedem mächtigem König steht eine noch mächtigere Königin. Enthält: Krone, Oberteil mit Armmanschetten, linken und rechten Ohrring, Rock und Sandalen. Ein sechteiliges Set also! [#Legal]
Dietro ogni re c'è una regina: quella che ha il vero potere. Include corona, top con bracciali, orecchino destro e sinistro, gonna e sandali, per un totale di 6 pezzi![#Legal]
Detrás de un rey siempre hay una reina: la que ostenta el verdadero poder. Incluye corona, chaleco con brazales, pendientes izquierdo y derecho, falda, y sandalias, ¡un total de 6 piezas![#Legal]
Behind every king is a queen--where the real power is. Includes Crown, Top With Armlets, Left and Right Earrings, Legs and Sandals for a total of 6 pieces! [#Legal]
모든 왕의 곁에는 여왕이 있습니다. 진정한 권력자이지요. 이 세트는 왕관, 상의, 하의, 왼쪽과 오른쪽 귀걸이, 그리고 샌들을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
Behind every king is a queen--where the real power is. Includes Crown, Top With Armlets, Left and Right Earrings, Legs and Sandals for a total of 6 pieces! [#Legal]
每個皇帝背後總有一個皇后，而那也是真正權力所在。套裝包括六件道具：后冠、上衣連臂鐲、左耳及右耳耳環、短裙及涼鞋。[#Legal]
